import React, { useCallback, useState } from 'react'; import { MoreVertical, Video, X, Search, MapPin, Link2, MoreHorizontal, Bell, Smile, ChevronDown, Globe, Lock, Plus, User, Users, Image, Camera, Tag, Edit2 } from 'react-feather'; import emoji1 from '../../assets/img/icons/emoji/emoji-1.svg' function ComposeCard(props) { const [isActive, setIsActive] = useState(false); const openModal = () => { setIsActive(true); props.setAppOverlay(true); console.log('open') } const closeModal = () => { console.log('close') setIsActive(false); props.setAppOverlay(false); } const ClickOpen = useCallback(() => { console.log('compose card') document.getElementById('compose-card').focus() }) return (
